// camera 0
camera
{
	Width = 640;
	Height = 480;
	Fov = 90;
	zBuffer = true;

	Origin = "64 64 -384";
	Angles = "15 10 0";

	Palette = 0;
}

// material 0
material
{
	Name = "Fallback Material";
	Fallback = true;

	Ambient = "0.1745 0.03175 0.03175";
	AmbientScale = 255;

	Diffuse = "0.61424 0.10136 0.10136";
	DiffuseScale = 255;

	Specular = "0.727811 0.626959 0.626959";
	SpecularScale = 255;
}
